name: Thick Buggy Back
description: Another backing for a jacket, made from LOCUSTS.

name: Thin Buggy Back
description: Another backing for a jacket, made from ANTS.

name: Esoteric Coat Backer
description: A layered leather & kevlar backing for a jacket. There's eyes all around it, & you're not sure if they're painted or stitched on. They keep looking at you... Did-Did that one just blink?

name: Cotton Coat Backer
description: A standard cotton backing for a jacket.

name: Thick Cotton Coat Backer
description: A thick cotton backing for a jacket. Warmer & more protective, but heavier.

name: Thin Cotton Coat Backer
description: A thin cotton backing for a jacket. Less protective, but it's pretty light.

name: Denim Coat Backer
description: A well-worn denim backing for a jacket.

name: Thick Denim Coat Backer
description: A thick denim backing for a jacket. It feels like a warm hug. Warmer & more protective, but heavier.

name: Denim Biker Coat Backer
description: A thick denim backing for a jacket. Covered in band patches & smelling of beer, it makes you feel like a proper biker. Warmer & more protective, but heavier.

name: Thin Denim Coat Backer
description: A thin denim backing for a jacket. It's decently light, but still pretty protective.

name: Leather Coat Backer
description: A brown leather backing for a jacket.

name: Thick Leather Coat Backer
description: A layered leather backing for a jacket. Brings out the cowboy in you. Warmer & more protective, but heavier.

name: Leather Biker Coat Backer
description: A layered leather backing for a jacket. Covered in band patches & smelling of beer, it makes you feel like a proper biker. Warmer & more protective, but heavier.

name: Thin Leather Coat Backer
description: A light leather backing for a jacket. Suitable to warm weather. It's decently light, but still pretty protective.

name: Canvas Coat Backer
description: A khaki canvas backing for a jacket.

name: Thick Canvas Coat Backer
description: A thick canvas backing for a jacket. It's good for protection, but weighs a little more on your weary shoulders.

name: Canvas Coat Backer
description: A thin canvas backing for a jacket. Lighter than most, & keeps you breathable.
A simple liner, mainly keeps the stitches from rubbing on your skin. This one is made from BUGS.

name: Cotton Coat liner
description: A simple liner, mainly keeps the stitches from rubbing on your skin.

name: Silk Coat liner
description: A bourgeois silk liner, mainly keeps the stitches from rubbing on your skin, but also keeps you super-comfy.
A thick fur liner, keeps you from being cold. This one is made from FURRY BUGS.

name: Fur liner
description: A thick liner made from fur. Excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering.

name: Faux-Fur liner
description: A thick fur liner, now cruelty-free! excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering.

name: Wool liner
description: A thick wool liner, excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering. It feels like cuddling a cloud.
A simple liner, mainly keeps the stitches from rubbing on your skin. This one is made from BUGS.

name: Cotton Trouser liner
description: A simple liner, mainly keeps the stitches from rubbing on your skin.

name: Silk Trouser liner
description: A bourgeois silk liner, mainly keeps the stitches from rubbing on your skin, but also keeps you super-comfy.
A thick fur liner, keeps you from being cold. This one is made from FURRY BUGS.

name: Fur liner
description: A thick liner made from fur. Excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering.

name: Faux-Fur liner
description: A thick fur liner, now cruelty-free! excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering.

name: Wool liner
description: A thick wool liner, excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering. It feels like walking through a cloud.
A pair of custom pockets, that allow you to put armor into the shins of your pants. One for the left, one for the right.
